# Image Segmentation with Avizo

Amira/Avizo3D is a commercial 3D image data visualisation and analysis toolkit.
It only runs on Windows, and for Deep Learning (re: image segmentation) task it requires a reasonably specced GPU.

If you have access to an appropriate  machine with a license, follow the deck below to complete a full image segmentation work flow.
